survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Workplace Sustainability Initiatives Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from employees regarding their satisfaction and engagement with current workplace sustainability initiatives.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with your company's sustainability initiatives?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to measure awareness levels. Ensure options are clear and mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with your company's sustainability initiatives?

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainability initiatives are you aware of in your workplace? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to assess awareness of specific initiatives. Include 'None of the above' for comprehensive data.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current workplace sustainability initiatives?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Ensure the scale is balanced.

questions.question_text: What additional sustainability initiatives would you like to see implemented in your workplace?
